definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑

sentences.english: Nails with ringworm may become thick and discoloured , and will sometimes start to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 釘子與癬可能成爲厚和變色，有時會開始崩潰。

sentences.english: However, contrary to its name, ringworm is a fungal infection of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 然而，與它的名稱，癬是一種真菌感染的皮膚。

sentences.english: Veterinary formula may be helpful in dealing with ringworm, mud fever and contaminated wounds.
sentences.chinese: 獸醫公式可能有助於處理癬，泥發燒及污染傷口。

sentences.english: Feet has ringworm, how to run?
What method good smelt metal does long tinea use on the neck?
sentences.chinese: 脖子上長癬用什麼方法好冶？

sentences.english: Is ringworm or eczema from it?
Diagnosis of ringworm can often be based on the characteristic scaly red ring on the surface of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 診斷癬往往可以基於特徵鱗片紅色環表面上的皮膚。

sentences.english: Pets such as dogs, cats and hamsters are among the most common animals that get ringworm.
sentences.chinese: 寵物，如狗，貓和倉鼠是最常見的動物得到癬。

sentences.english: The dogs herded the sheep together.
Ringworm is the name of a common skin disease.
sentences.chinese: 金錢癬是一種常見的皮膚病。

sentences.english: It is more effective to thoroughly change socks after cured dermatophytosis.
sentences.chinese: 如足底癬好轉後要更新襪子，效果更佳。

sentences.english: It is called ringworm because the infection often appears as a round shape or ring.
sentences.chinese: 這是所謂的癬，因爲感染，往往出現一個圓形或環形。

sentences.english: Ringworm is also more likely to thrive in warm damp areas.
sentences.chinese: 癬是也更有可能發展壯大，在溫暖潮溼的地區。

sentences.english: One scabbed sheep will mar a whole flock.
Is it a long winter of ringworm or salted?
sentences.chinese: 請問是冬季長癬還是醃了？

definition: moss/lichen/moss on damp walls/used erroneously for 蘇|苏
a long narrow vessel with two masts
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
to dig out/to pick out (with one's fingers)/to carve/to cut/to study meticulously/to lift one's clothes/stingy/miserly
